FROM mart_inventory_wide
GROUP BY item_no, item_no, location_no, unit
LIMIT 100

results.natural_language: 查詢客戶的出貨記錄、出貨金額和對應的售價審核記錄
results.error_message: 此查詢涉及多表格，請提供至少2個過濾條件以縮小查詢範圍，避免耗用過多資源

results.natural_language: 查詢庫存數量大於100且過去90天沒有出貨記錄的料號
results.sql:
SELECT item_no, item_no AS warehouse_no, location_no, unit, SUM(existing_stocks) AS existing_stocks
FROM mart_inventory_wide
GROUP BY item_no, item_no, location_no, unit
LIMIT 100

results.description: 庫存充足且無工單料號
results.natural_language: 查詢庫存大於1000且當前沒有進行中工單的料號
results.sql:
SELECT item_no, item_no AS warehouse_no, location_no, unit, SUM(existing_stocks) AS existing_stocks
FROM mart_inventory_wide
GROUP BY item_no, item_no, location_no, unit
LIMIT 100

results.natural_language: 查詢報廢率超過20%的工單
results.sql:
SELECT COUNT(item_no) AS work_order_count
FROM mart_work_order_wide
LIMIT 100

results.natural_language: 查詢出貨金額大於100萬的客戶列表
results.sql:
SELECT doc_no, doc_date, customer_no, status, SUM(actual_qty) AS request_qty, SUM(actual_qty) AS actual_qty
FROM mart_shipping_wide
GROUP BY doc_no, doc_date, customer_no, status
LIMIT 100

FROM mart_shipping_wide

LIMIT 100

results.natural_language: 按月份和業務部門統計出貨數量、金額和訂單數
results.sql:
SELECT doc_no, doc_date, customer_no, status, SUM(actual_qty) AS request_qty, SUM(actual_qty) AS actual_qty

results.natural_language: 按庫存數量將料號分類為高庫存（>1000）、正常庫存（100-1000）、低庫存（<100）並統計
results.sql:
SELECT item_no, item_no AS warehouse_no, location_no, unit, SUM(existing_stocks) AS existing_stocks, item_no AS warehouse_no
FROM mart_inventory_wide
WHERE item_no = '1000'
GROUP BY item_no, item_no, location_no, unit, item_no
LIMIT 100
